Topic.Title: Is it possible to remove a game?

Posts.EditableText: I really want to remove two of my games, is that possible? Or at least to change the description?
Posts.HTML: I really want to remove two of my games, is that possible? Or at least to change the description?

Posts.EditableText: Yes, just let me know which games you want removed or changed - email me at alex@axeuk.com
Posts.HTML: Yes, just let me know which games you want removed or changed - email me at alex@axeuk.com
